heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
guidesSubtitle: Meet our expert guides, dedicated to your healing process.
contactSubtitle: We are here to answer your questions and accompany you on your journey.
footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred Amazonian brew, a powerful healing tool that cleanses the body, mind, and spirit, opening the doors to deep introspection and spiritual connection.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca induces an expanded state of consciousness that allows access to repressed memories and emotions, facilitating their release and healing. It is an inner journey, guided by the wisdom of the plant.
spiritualMasterTitle: The Plant as a Spiritual Teacher
spiritualMasterDescription: Considered a teacher, Ayahuasca teaches through visions and revelations, showing the path to self-realization, forgiveness, and understanding our purpose in the universe.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Gain a new perspective on your life, relationships, and challenges, finding answers and solutions from a place of deep wisdom.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release traumas, fears, and emotional blocks that prevent you from living fully, allowing joy and inner peace to flourish.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Deepen your connection with yourself, with others, and with the universe, experiencing a sense of unity and belonging that transforms your life.
groupCeremonyDescription: Share the healing experience in a supportive circle, where the group's energy enhances individual and collective work.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, designed to address your specific needs in an environment of total privacy and support.
exploreMedicineDescription: Discover the origins, benefits, and profound wisdom of Ayahuasca.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the team of spiritual guides who will accompany you in your healing process.
preparationCtaDescription: Good preparation is key to a profound experience. Discover our recommendations.
contactCommunityText: Join our community to share experiences, receive support, and stay connected with the medicine. Or contact us directly for any inquiries.
whatsappCommunityTitle: Join our WhatsApp community for news and updates.
guidesPageSubtitle: Our team is composed of experienced and compassionate guides, dedicated to holding a safe and sacred space for your healing journey. Each one brings a deep connection with the medicine and an unwavering commitment to your well-being.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to continue your journey.
registerSubtext: Join our community to start your path.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errorMinLength: The {{field}} must be at least {{count}} characters long.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully signed in with Google.
registerSuccessDescription: Your account has been created. Welcome!
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore all our upcoming and past ceremonies.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies at this time. Please check back soon.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill out the form to create a new ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
errorPositiveNumber: The {{field}} must be a positive number.
fullPlanUpTo: Full plan for up to 5 people
editHeroVideoDescription: Replace the main video on the homepage.
selectNewVideo: Or select a new video to upload
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please select a video file or enter a URL.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete the guide from the database.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content, users, and settings.
notFoundDescription: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Preparation is a fundamental pillar for a deep and transformative experience. Follow this guide to align your body, mind, and spirit.
preparationProcessDescription: Navigate the phases of the experience, from preparation to integration.
ceremonyProcessDescription: Immerse yourself in the sacred ritual with trust and openness.
experienceProcessDescription: Embrace the inner journey, its challenges, and revelations.
integrationProcessDescription: Apply the teachings of the medicine in your daily life.
dietSubtitle: A clean and light diet is essential. We recommend following it for at least 3-5 days before and after the ceremony.
allowedFoodsList: Fresh fruits and vegetables, Whole grains (oats, brown rice), Legumes, White fish, Chicken (skinless), Pure water, Herbal teas
prohibitedFoodsList: Red meat and pork, Fried or processed foods, Dairy, Refined sugars, Caffeine and alcohol, Spicy or highly fermented food
mentalPrepSubtitle: Cultivate a state of calm and receptivity to open yourself to the experience.
meditationDescription: Dedicate time to silence, meditation, or prayer to calm the mind.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you wish to heal, understand, or release. Write it down.
reflectionDescription: Keep a journal to note your thoughts, dreams, and emotions.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca can bring deep emotions to the surface. Prepare to face what arises with an attitude of acceptance and without judgment. Trust the process and the wisdom of the medicine. You are in a safe space to feel and release.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony?
comfortItemsList: Comfortable and warm clothing (in layers), Blanket or sleeping bag, Pillow or cushion, Yoga mat
essentialsList: Water in a reusable bottle, Tissues, A personal power object (optional), Journal and pen for afterwards
authRequiredJourneyDescription: Log in or sign up to access this part of your healing path.
authRequiredCeremoniesDescription: Log in or sign up to view and reserve our ceremonies.
authRequiredDescription: You must be logged in to perform this action.
userManagementSubtitle: Manage users, their roles, and permissions in the application.
allUsersDescription: Browse and manage all registered user profiles.
searchUserPlaceholder: Search by name, email, or phone...
deleteUserConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? This action is irreversible.
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users on the platform.
invitationTabDescription: Manage WhatsApp message templates to invite users to complete the questionnaire.
newTemplateMessageES: Hello! We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue with your reservation process at El Arte de Sanar. You can do it here: https://artedesanar.vercel.app/questionnaire
newTemplateMessageEN: Hello! We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue with your reservation process at The Art of Healing. You can do it here: https://artedesanar.vercel.app/questionnaire
selectInvitationTemplateDescription: Choose which message to send to {{name}} via WhatsApp.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review the responses submitted by the user.
noAnswersSubmitted: This user has not yet submitted their answers.
resetQuestionnaireConfirmDescription: This will delete the questionnaire responses for {{name}} and reset their preparation progress. Are you sure?
authRequiredCoursesDescription: Log in or sign up to access our preparation courses.
coursesDescription: Prepare for your journey with our video courses. Required content must be completed before the ceremony.
addCourseDescription: Add a new video to the course list.
editCourseDescription: Edit the details of this course.
deleteCourseConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete the course.
assignCeremonyDescriptionAdmin: Select the ceremonies this user is enrolled in.
myChatsSubtitle: Continue your conversations with our AI spiritual guide.
myConversationsDescription: Here you can find and continue your previous chats.
startConversationWithGuide: Start a conversation with the guide
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am your spiritual guide. I am here to help you on your healing path and answer your questions about the medicine. How can I help you today?
chatHistorySubtitle: Review all user conversations with the AI guide.
allConversationsDescription: Explore past interactions to better understand users.
viewUserChatsDescription: Review this user's past conversations with the AI guide.
errorCannotDeleteSelf: You cannot delete your own admin account.
errorCountryCodeRequired: Please select a country code if you enter a phone number.
emailUpdatedSuccess: Email updated! Check your new inbox for verification.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: A verification email has been sent to your new address.
enterPasswordToConfirm: To confirm, please enter your current password.
preparationCompleteDescription: You have finished the preparation guide. You are one step closer to your healing journey. Review your answers or explore the recommended courses.
pleaseCompleteThisStep: Please complete this step before continuing.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: These are the answers you provided. If you need to change them, please contact a guide.
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDesc: It is crucial for your safety that we know your medical history.
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDetails: Please detail any relevant medical conditions.
questionnaireMedicationDesc: Are you currently taking any medication (including antidepressants, anxiolytics, or supplements)?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Specify which medications or supplements you are taking.
questionnaireMentalHealthDesc: Do you have any history of mental health conditions (such as depression, anxiety, schizophrenia, etc.)?
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Briefly describe your mental health history.
questionnaireExperienceDesc: Have you participated in an Ayahuasca ceremony or another ceremony with medicinal plants before?
questionnaireIntentionDesc: What is your main intention or what are you looking to heal with this experience?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: e.g., I'm seeking clarity on my life's purpose, I want to heal a past wound...
errorRequiredDetails: Please provide details if your answer is 'Yes'.
aiGuideDescription: You are now ready for the next step!
aiGuideContent: Our video courses and AI guide are here to deepen your preparation and answer your questions. The required content must be completed before your ceremony.
exportDataDescription: Download a backup of all important Firestore collections (users, ceremonies, etc.) in a JSON file.
importDataDescription: Restore the application from a JSON backup file. This action will overwrite existing data.
importWarningDescription: You are about to overwrite ALL current data with the contents of the backup file. This action cannot be undone.
importSuccessDescription: The data has been successfully restored.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before the last import. You can use it to revert the changes if something went wrong.
rollbackWarningDescription: This will restore the database to the state it was in before the last import. Are you sure?
rollbackSuccessDescription: The data has been restored to the previous state.
errorLogsSubtitle: Review system errors to diagnose issues.
systemLogsDescription: Errors captured by the system are displayed here.
deleteAllLogsConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete all error logs. Are you sure?

allLogsDeleted: All error logs have been deleted.
analyticsDescription: Visualize which sections of the homepage receive the most interaction.
resetAnalyticsConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete all click tracking data. Are you sure?
resetCountersConfirmDescription: This will reset the view and click counters for this ceremony to zero. Are you sure?
viewUserAuditLogDescription: Review important actions this user has performed in the system.
noLogsFound: No audit logs found for this user.

themeUpdateReload: The page will reload to apply the changes.
